member.summary: Reads a block of bytes from the current stream and writes the data to a buffer.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current stream.

The maximum number of bytes to read.

The maximum number of bytes to write.

The maximum number of bytes to write.
